question: A certain sum amounts to 5832 Rs. in 2 years at 8% per annum compound interest, the sum is :
explanation:
$latex 5832 = P \\left ( 1+\\frac{8}{100} \\right )^{2}&s=1$
$latex => 5832 = P \\left ( 1+\\frac{2}{25} \\right )^{2}&s=1$
$latex => 5832 = P\\times \\frac{27}{25}\\times \\frac{27}{25}&s=1$
$latex => P = \\frac{5832\\times 25\\times 25}{27\\times 27} = 5000 Rs.&s=1$
Hence option [A] is correct answer.
